Please follow the shared ESRF Python contributing guidelines below. When adding code that touches the filesystem, prefer the utilities in `esrf_statusgui.file_utils.paths`, which wrap `esrf-pathlib` for consistent visitor-root detection and metadata.

<a href="https://gitlab.esrf.fr/dau/ci/pyci/-/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md" target="_blank">CONTRIBUTING.md</a>
